name: Chinese-English Custom Name Painting
description: Custom name translation on 6x8 rice paper ready to be matted and framed by you. Your order will include two matching, original paintings with the first or last name of your choice.

name: FAMILY Chinese Holiday Ornament
description: FAMILY ornament features the handpainted Chinese character FAMILY on one side of the 2" square ornament and the English translation on the reverse. I sand, stain and paint the ornament and then attach a tiny black ribbon with tiny black nails so it is ready to hang immediately. Always complimentary gift wrap and free shipping with another item!

name: FAITH, HOPE & CHARITY set of 3
description:
Set of 3 Chinese double characters FAITH, HOPE & CHARITY with English translation. Each board is a 5" x 10" handpainted original art piece by Mandarin Boards. Ribbon shown in brown, also available in black.

Always free gift wrap!

name: COURAGE Chinese Wall Art
description:
Chinese double character COURAGE with English translation. 5" x 10" handpainted original art by Mandarin Boards. Ribbon shown in brown, also available in black.

Always free gift wrap!

name: LOVE Chinese Wall Art
description:
The components of the LOVE character are a heart, two people holding hands and a roof. I LOVE this because of the deeper message it sends and because it is a central part of many other beautiful characters in the Chinese writing system (see my listing for GRACE and CHARITY). 
This 7.5"x7.5" board features the Chinese character LOVE with the English translation. I handpaint my characters and never use stencils because I want every piece with my name on it to be a unique original. LOVE is designed as a wall hanging, but is also beautiful displayed on an easel. The hanging ribbon is shown in brown but is also available in black. 
As always, free gift wrap!
